ajxpdriver.name: webdav
ajxpdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[WebDAV (PEAR)]
ajxpdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Access a WebDAV server. Requires PEAR/HTTP_WebDAVClient installed with the patched found in the plugin folder applied.]

param.name: HOST
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Host]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Host of the WebDAV server, with http/https and without trailing slash. Can contain user:password too.]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Uri]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to the root folder on the server]

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Creation Mask]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.]
